net.derquinse.common.io
Class MemoryByteSourceLoader

java.lang.Object
  net.derquinse.common.io.MemoryByteSourceLoader

public final class MemoryByteSourceLoader
extends Object

Memory byte source loader.

Author:
Andres Rodriguez

Method Summary
 MemoryByteSourceLoader chunkSize(int chunkSize)
          Specifies the chunk size to use (the default is 8192 bytes).
static MemoryByteSourceLoader create()
          Creates a new loader.
 MemoryByteSource load(InputStream is)
          Loads the contents of the input stream into a memory byte source.
 MemoryByteSourceLoader maxSize(int maxSize)
          Specifies the maximum size allowed (the default is limited only by memory available).
 MemoryByteSourceLoader setDirect(boolean direct)
          Specifies if the loader should use direct memory (the default is to use heap memory).

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Method Detail

create

public static MemoryByteSourceLoader create()
Creates a new loader.

setDirect

public MemoryByteSourceLoader setDirect(boolean direct)
Specifies if the loader should use direct memory (the default is to use heap memory).

Parameters:
direct - True to use direct memory, false to use heap.
Returns:
This loader.
Throws:
IllegalStateException - if the use of direct or heap memory has already been set.

maxSize

public MemoryByteSourceLoader maxSize(int maxSize)
Specifies the maximum size allowed (the default is limited only by memory available).

Returns:
This loader.
Throws:
IllegalStateException - if the maximum size has already been set.
IllegalArgumentException - if the argument is not greater than zero.

chunkSize

public MemoryByteSourceLoader chunkSize(int chunkSize)
Specifies the chunk size to use (the default is 8192 bytes).

Returns:
This loader.
Throws:
IllegalStateException - if the chunk size has already been set.
IllegalArgumentException - if the argument is not greater than zero.

load

public MemoryByteSource load(InputStream is)
                      throws IOException
Loads the contents of the input stream into a memory byte source.

Parameters:
is - Input stream. It is not closed.
Returns:
The loaded data in a byte source.
Throws:
IOException
